page.title: 12GHOST STORIES
page.content: {GHOST STORIES - MOBBERLEY. {SUPERNATURAL. In this block we have discovered three tales of the supernatural. In two of the cases the stories have been passed down as hear-say, and therefore several versions seem to exist. So although the basic facts stay the same the story which has built up around them differs in each version. {GHOST SIGHTINGS. The only intervewee to experience a "sighting" first hand is the owner of "Sovereign Stud". The lady has seen on several occasions, in her kitchen, a young man dressed as an Airman and wearing a white silk scarf round his neck. He always faces Northwards, and as she enters the kitchen he looks towards her, smiles and fades away. Despite the experiences, the lady has never felt frightened.
